modName: Devlina - Full Level 81 Save - For testing purposes only
descriptionHtml:
This save is intended for people that want a character for testing purposes and if you like it please endorse it. Note: all the quests including the DLC ones are completed and sorry for the low resolution images in the gallery.

Short description
--------------------

- Race: High Elf
- Class: Battle Mage
- Armor: Mega Heavy
- No cheats, except for a few small side quests that didn\'t progress on their own and I had to use the console to set the stages
- All Skills: 100, leveling them bored me to death!!!
- 99.9% completed all Quests from Skyrim + Dawnguard + Dragonborn + Hearthfire, there might be 1 or 2 that I might have missed in the opened world
- Completed Hearthfire house and adopted 2 bastard children (boy & girl) and then moved the wife in. Horrible DLC, enjoy.
- Killed all vampired from Dawnguard
- You can now ride dragons and do other crazy stuff offered by the Dragonborn DLC
- Follower: Serana / Aela
- All shouts, or at least I think I got them all
- Beast form: Werewolf
- Civil War won by: Stormcloaks, it doesn\'t matter who wins
- Married to: Camilla Valerius
- Thane in all towns + all houses
- House: Solitude, most items and weapons are in the chest, at the end of the bed, on the top floor
- Horse: Shadowmere / Arvak
- Thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3712194]harryday247[/url]\'s fox eyes, i fixed a small \"bug\" o.O that made available two more perk points (80 + 2) at level 81, that were invested in the skill trees, so now they are removed.


Used Mods
------------

- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19]Unofficial Skyrim Patch[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23491]Unofficial Dawnguard Patch[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31083]Unofficial Dragonborn Patch[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25127]Unofficial Hearthfire Patch[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27371]Better Dialogue Controls[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14007]Green Water Fix[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]CBBE- by Caliente[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28879]MacKoms Real Skin for Men[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28645]Nuska Real Skin for Women[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30710]Auriels Shield Gold[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30612]Glorious Daedric Retexture[/url]

- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13456]Better third person combat camera[/url] - this are my settings:

[Camera]
fOverShoulderCombatAddY=0.0000
fOverShoulderCombatPosZ=22.0000
fOverShoulderCombatPosX=42.0000


My other Mods
-----------------
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35836]Bastion - Easter Egg Edition BETA[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30302]Euro Tree House Updated[/url]
author: Seulgames
